# Advertising Campaign #

***Hola amigos de Hive y de esta bella comunidad @skinandbodycare üëãüèª feliz y bendecido martes, me alegra estar por ac√° de nuevo con ustedes, en esta oportunidad les cuento mi experiencia usando el bloqueador solar ‚òÄÔ∏è Dissar.***

***El bloqueador solar anti edad Disaar tiene un nivel de SPF50, ofrece aproximadamente un 98% de protecci√≥n contra rayos UVB. El n√∫mero que acompa√±a al SPF, indica el n√∫mero de veces que el protector o bloqueador aumenta la resistencia natural de tu piel ante quemaduras solares. Es decir, un protector con SPF 50 significa que tu piel tardar√° 50 veces m√°s en quemarse que si no te hubieras puesto protecci√≥n.***

***Me gusta mucho, ya que la La f√≥rmula es refrescante, tiene una textura ligera fina y natural que la piel puede absorber r√°pidamente, sin obstruir los poros, adecuado para todo tipo de piel, enriquecido con extractos naturales  y antioxidantes. Forma una estrecha red protectora en la superficie de la piel, para bloquear los da√±os solares, aumenta la capacidad de defensa de la piel fortaleciendo y mejorando la elasticidad,  previene arrugas y l√≠neas finas.***

***Debo comentarles que antes de comprar el producto estuve revisando sus ingredientes y principios activos, y me encant√≥ la combinaci√≥n, ya que as√≠ nos brinda un mejor resultado para el cuidado de nuestra piel.***

***Sus principales principios activos:***

***‚úìRetinol: El efecto del retinol permite que la piel mejore su textura, color y brillo, adem√°s de reducir las arrugas, las l√≠neas de expresi√≥n y los pliegues que se generan con el tiempo debido a la p√©rdida de firmeza y flexibilidad de la piel.  Funciona como una bomba antioxidante y despigmentante que logra eliminar las manchas que aparecen, penetrando en las capas profundas de la piel e incrementando el col√°geno, la elastina, el √°cido hialur√≥nico y los betacarotenos.***

***‚úìNicotinamida: puede ayudar a construir prote√≠nas en la piel y evitar que se pierda la humedad para prevenir los da√±os ocasionados por el estr√©s ambiental.***

***Los beneficios individuales de la nicotinamida incluyen: minimiza la apariencia de los poros, regula la piel grasa, protege contra el da√±o solar, tr√°ta la hiperpigmentaci√≥n, minimiza l√≠neas de expresi√≥n y arrugas finas, protege contra el estr√©s oxidativo y tambi√©n trata el acn√©.***

***Vitamina C: La vitamina C es imprescindible para nuestro organismo porque adem√°s de sintetizar col√°geno, tiene poder hidratante, efecto antiinflamatorio y ayuda al sistema inmunol√≥gico. A la vez es fundamental para el desarrollo y reparaci√≥n de tejidos, lo que la convierte en un elemento clave para tener una piel sana y radiante.***

***El cuerpo humano no produce su propia vitamina C y tampoco la almacena, de esta manera, s√≥lo se puede obtener a trav√©s de v√≠as nutricionales y t√≥picas. De esta manera, no solo deber√≠a ser parte esencial de nuestra alimentaci√≥n, sino un paso important√≠simo en la rutina de cuidado de nuestra piel.***

***‚úìAporta luminosidad, ya que suprime la s√≠ntesis de la melanina.***

***‚úìEs despigmentante. Sin sol, la vitamina C reduce la melanina (pigmento encargado de colorear la piel), bajo la exposici√≥n solar regula su producci√≥n.***

***‚úìEs antioxidante ya que disminuye el da√±o producido por la radiaci√≥n solar, previniendo la formaci√≥n de radicales libres y el envejecimiento de la piel.***

***‚úìAnti edad, por su capacidad de promover la s√≠ntesis de col√°geno y √°cido hialur√≥nico.***

***Tambi√©n tiene dos ingredientes infaltables en un bloqueador, protector o pantalla solar:*** 

***‚úìDioxido de titanio: funciona como un filtro UV de amplioespectro, lo cual quiere decir que tiene la capacidad para absorber y dispersarlos rayos tanto UVA como UVB, protegiendo la piel de la quemadura solar. La forma en la que act√∫a es reflejando la luz del sol.***

***‚úìOxido de zinc: Entre los beneficios del √≥xido de zinc en el cuidado de la piel se incluye principalmente la protecci√≥n frente a los rayos UVA y UVB. Tambi√©n tiene una acci√≥n antibacteriana que puede ayudar a prevenir brotes y manchas al reducir las bacterias de la piel.***

***Modo de uso: se aplica la cantidad de bloqueador en dos dedos y se esparce muy bien por todo el rostro, y es muy f√°cil ya que su textura es ligera, permite que se absorba r√°pidamente. Cada dos o tres horas, se debe reaplicar para que pueda proteger la piel como se debe.***

![GIF_20241211_000856_070.gif](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/barbyjr/23wC9Lo8ycptdoGxWXiRskhKmf2LkyRVxXNgXii5cDDeXGB649k1WpZ1xKL4UU1Bv5MHS.gif)

***Me gusta mucho, pero les recomiendo que sea  de uso diario, ya que no es resistente al agua, lo puse a prueba haciendo ejercicio y no, no es resistente, en cambio para uso diario si funciona perfectamente. Por eso es bueno probar cada producto y ver si te resulta o no.***

***Bueno amigos espero sea de su agrado, muchas gracias por visitar mi blog üôèüèª√©xitos y bendiciones para todos! Hasta la pr√≥xima.***

***Todas las fotos y v√≠deos son de mi autor√≠a, captadas con mi tel√©fono üì≤ LGK42.***

***Edici√≥n: Canva.***

> ***[La traducci√≥n se realiz√≥ con traductor deepl](https://www.deepl.com/es/translator)***

> ***English:***

> ***Hello friends of Hive and this beautiful community @skinandbodycare üëãüèª happy and blessed Tuesday, I'm glad to be here again with you, this time I'll tell you about my experience using the Dissar sunscreen.***

> ***Disaar anti-aging sunscreen has an SPF50 level, offering approximately 98% protection against UVB rays. The number that accompanies the SPF indicates the number of times that the protector or blocker increases your skin's natural resistance to sunburn. That is, a protector with SPF 50 means that your skin will take 50 times longer to burn than if you had not put on protection.***

>***I like it a lot, since the formula is refreshing, has a light, fine and natural texture that the skin can absorb quickly, without clogging the pores suitable for all skin types enriched with natural extracts and antioxidants. It forms a tight protective network on the surface of the skin, to block sun damage, increases the skin's defense capacity by strengthening and improving elasticity, prevents wrinkles and fine lines.***

> ***I must tell you that before buying the product I was reviewing its ingredients and active ingredients, and I loved the combination, since it gives us a better result for the care of our skin.***

> ***Its main active ingredients:***

> ***‚úìRetinol: The effect of retinol allows the skin to improve its texture, color and brightness, in addition to reducing wrinkles, expression lines and folds that are generated over time due to the loss of firmness and flexibility of the skin. It works as an antioxidant and depigmenting bomb that manages to eliminate the spots that appear, penetrating the deep layers of the skin and increasing collagen, elastin, hyaluronic acid and beta-carotenes.***

> ***‚úìNicotinamide: can help build proteins in the skin and prevent moisture loss to prevent damage caused by environmental stress.***

> ***The individual benefits of nicotinamide include: it minimizes the appearance of pores, regulates oily skin, protects against sun damage, treats hyperpigmentation, minimizes fine lines and wrinkles, protects against oxidative stress, and also treats acne.***

> ***Vitamin C: Vitamin C is essential for our body because in addition to synthesizing collagen, it has moisturizing power, an anti-inflammatory effect, and helps the immune system. At the same time, it is essential for the development and repair of tissues, which makes it a key element for having healthy and radiant skin.***

> ***The human body does not produce its own vitamin C and does not store it either, so it can only be obtained through nutritional and topical routes. In this way, it should not only be an essential part of our diet, but a very important step in our skin care routine.***

> ***‚úìIt provides luminosity, since it suppresses the synthesis of melanin.***

> ***‚úìIt is a depigmenting agent. Without sun, vitamin C reduces melanin (pigment responsible for coloring the skin), under sun exposure it regulates its production.***

> ***‚úìIt is an antioxidant since it reduces the damage caused by solar radiation, preventing the formation of free radicals and skin aging.***

> ***‚úìAnti-aging, due to its ability to promote the synthesis of collagen and hyaluronic acid.***

> ***It also has two essential ingredients in a sunscreen:***

> ***‚úìTitanium dioxide: it works as a broad-spectrum UV filter, which means that it has the ability to absorb and disperse both UVA and UVB rays, protecting the skin from sunburn. The way it works is by reflecting sunlight.***

> ***‚úìZinc oxide: Among the benefits of zinc oxide in skin care, it mainly includes protection against UVA and UVB rays. It also has an antibacterial action that can help prevent breakouts and spots by reducing bacteria on the skin.***

> ***How to use: apply the amount of sunscreen on two fingers and spread it very well over the entire face, and it is very easy since its texture is light, allowing it to be absorbed quickly. Every two or three hours, it should be reapplied so that it can protect the skin as it should.***

![GIF_20241211_001110_878.gif](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/barbyjr/23xARfQAgRxmSbomwHah5XXVm83tZ6DYmhzXaSJb2hZqzhDV8niXAfGaixBvjGjC9Ff7b.gif)

> ***I like it a lot, but I recommend that you use it daily, since it is not waterproof, I tested it while exercising and no, it is not resistant, but for daily use it works perfectly. That is why it is good to try each product and see if it works for you or not.***

> ***Well friends, I hope you like it, thank you very much for visiting my blog üôèüèª success and blessings to all! Until next time.***

"Please follow @tayo6. He donated blood for his sister."

> ***All photos and videos are my own, captured with my phone üì≤ LGK42.***

> ***Edition: Canva.***

> ***[The translation was done with deepl translator](https://www.deepl.com/es/translator)***

author: luisfe
root_title: Hive Music Festival Week 113 Round 2 Chozetsu Dynamic (Primer Opening de Dragon Ball Super)Cover By @luisfe
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmU7WMndraMQkzjrZvfADkcE89priuYAEWy1hUzNWmfQUk/sin_t_tulo.png

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1HdY0P3mr0U&feature=youtu.be
---
Hola, comunidad de m√∫sicos, aprendices, avanzados y profesionales...siempre dispuestos a aprender, porque el camino de la m√∫sica es infinito. Estoy muy entusiasmado con lo que estoy logrando con el teclado, creo que es un instrumento maravilloso. Sus posibilidades mel√≥dicas son realmente impresionantes porque nos permite jugar con los sonidos de diversos instrumentos. Hoy les traigo mi versi√≥n de Chozetsu Dynamic que es el primer opening de Dragon Ball Super. Una melod√≠a que me encanta. Les traigo tambi√©n el video en su versi√≥n original que prefiero a la versi√≥n latina, en parte porque me gusta m√°s el timbre de voz del vocalista de la versi√≥n original y porque en la traducci√≥n al castellano... esa parte de la letra que dice "Vuela, pega y esquiva" me parece...un poco tonto. Bueno... son las cosas inevitables - creo - de las traducciones. Me imagino que en el √°mbito de la poes√≠a las traducciones deben generar verdaderos problemas... los poetas quieren expresar algo en forma simb√≥lica y resulta que ese s√≠mbolo en otro idioma y otra cultura puede significar hasta ¬°Lo opuesto! Bien, les presento mi trabajo con esta pieza y realmente me gustar√≠a mucho que fuera de su agrado. El video es publicado en Youtube y no en 3Speak como dicen las reglas del concurso. Ten√≠a entendido que se hab√≠a arreglado 3Speak, sin embargo... la publicaci√≥n m√°s reciente fue hace dos d√≠as y mi madre estuvo anoche hasta la una de la madrugada tratando de subir un video y en el √∫ltimo momento sal√≠a el texto de que que todo el proceso hab√≠a sido fallido y que lo comenzara de nuevo. Habr√° qu√© esperar un poco m√°s. ¬øQui√©n compuso Chozetsu Dynamic el primer Opening de Dragon Ball Super? Esta es una pregunta importante que deber√≠amos hacernos cada vez que escuch√°ramos una pieza musical ya que muchas veces no vamos m√°s all¬¥- ni nos interesamos en ir m√°s all√° ‚Äì de conocer al int√©rprete principal, quien ‚Äúla puso de moda‚Äù,. qu√© otras versiones tiene‚Ä¶pero ¬°Qu√© importantes son los autores y compositores sin los cuales los vocalistas e instrumentistas no tendr√≠amos material sobre cual trabajar! El compositor de la melod√≠a fue Kazuya Yoshii de The Yellow Monkey quien tambi√©n interpret√≥ originalmente la canci√≥n "Ch≈çzetsu‚òÜDynamic!" ( "¬°Excelente din√°mica!"). La letra fue escrita por Yukinojo Mori, a quien le debemos muchas de las canciones de la serie Dragon Ball Una productiva semana para todos y que siga sonando la m√∫sica.

https://images.ecency.com/DQmb68JauZWS6qf8nzPW634vndPYUWia7X9YUqDcPKnf4BU/separador_azul_sisisi.png

ENGLISH VERSION

https://images.ecency.com/DQmU7WMndraMQkzjrZvfADkcE89priuYAEWy1hUzNWmfQUk/sin_t_tulo.png

Hello, community of musicians, apprentices, advanced and professionals...always willing to learn, because the path of music is infinite. I'm very excited about what I'm achieving with the keyboard, I think it's a wonderful instrument. Its melodic possibilities are truly impressive because it allows us to play with the sounds of various instruments. Today I bring you my version of Chozetsu Dynamic, which is the first opening of Dragon Ball Super. A melody that I love. I also bring you the video in its original version, which I prefer to the Latin version, partly because I like the timbre of the vocalist's voice better in the original version and because in the Spanish translation... that part of the lyrics that says " Fly, hit and dodge" seems...a little silly to me. Well... they are the inevitable things - I think - of translations. I imagine that in the field of poetry, translations must generate real problems... poets want to express something in symbolic form and it turns out that that symbol in another language and another culture can even mean the opposite! Well, I present my work with this piece and I would really like it if you like it. The video is published on YouTube and not on 3Speak as the contest rules say. I understood that 3Speak had been fixed, however... the most recent publication was two days ago and my mother was up until one in the morning last night trying to upload a video and at the last moment the text came out that the entire process had been failed and to start it again. We will have to wait a little longer. Who composed Chozetsu Dynamic the first Dragon Ball Super Opening? This is an important question that we should ask ourselves every time we listen to a piece of music since many times we do not go further - nor are we interested in going further - than knowing the main performer, who ‚Äúmade it fashionable‚Äù. What other versions does it have...but how important are the authors and composers, without whom the vocalists and instrumentalists would not have material to work on! The composer of the melody was Kazuya Yoshii of The Yellow Monkey who also originally performed the song "Ch≈çzetsu‚òÜDynamic!" ("Excellent dynamics!"). The lyrics were written by Yukinojo Mori, to whom we owe many of the songs in the Dragon Ball series A productive week for everyone and let the music keep playing.

https://images.ecency.com/DQmb68JauZWS6qf8nzPW634vndPYUWia7X9YUqDcPKnf4BU/separador_azul_sisisi.png


LETRA DE LA CANCI√ìN
Chouzetsu Dynamic „ÅÑ„Å§„Åã„Å®„Åé„Çå„Åü Itsuka togireta Â§¢„ÅÆÁ∂ö„ÅçÂßã„ÇÅ„Çà„ÅÜ yume no tsuzuki hajimeyou Êòü„Çí„Å§„Å™„Åí„Å¶ hoshi wo tsunagete Á©∫„Å´Êââ„Åã„Åë„Å∞„ÅÑ„ÅÑ sora ni tobira kakeba ii Êñ∞„Åü„Å™„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Ç∏„ÅØ Arata na SUTEJI wa Á•û„Å´Êåë„ÇÄÂ†¥ÊâÄ kami ni idomu basho ËààÂ•ÆÔºüÁåõÁÉàÔºü„ÉÄ„Ç§„Éä„Éü„ÉÉ„ÇØ K≈çfun? M≈çretsu? Dainamikku „É¨„ÉÉ„ÉÑ„Ç¥„ÉºÔºÅ„Ç¥„ÉºÔºÅÂ§ß„Éë„Éã„ÉÉ„ÇØ RETTSUG≈å! G≈å! Dai PANIKKU Ë≤†„Åë„Çã„Å®Âº∑„Åè„Å™„Çã Makeru to tsuyoku naru Ë∫´„ÅÆÁ®ãÁü•„Çâ„Åö„Å´„ÅØ Mi no hodo shirazu ni wa ÂæåÊÇî„Å®„ÅãÈôêÁïå„Å®„Åã„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„Çì K≈çkai toka genkai toka nai mon Â£ÆÁµ∂ÔºüË∂ÖÁµ∂Ôºü„ÉÄ„Ç§„Éä„Éü„ÉÉ„ÇØ S≈çzetsu? Ch≈çzetsu? Dainamikku „É¨„ÉÉ„ÉÑ„Ç¥„ÉºÔºÅ„Ç§„Ç®„ÇπÔºÅÈÄ£Êâì„Ç≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ RETTSUG≈å! IESU! M≈çretsu? Dainamikku „É¨„ÉÉ„ÉÑ„Ç¥„ÉºÔºÅ„Ç¥„ÉºÔºÅÂ§ß„Éë„Éã„ÉÉ„ÇØ RETTSUG≈å! G≈å! author: sayury
root_title: EJERCICIO 1 PARA APRENDER A TOCAR EL RITMO LATINO SALSA EN TECLADO / EXERCISE TO LEARN TO PLAY THE LATIN SALSA RHYTHM ON THE KEYBOARD
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmQ77CEnB35hpYMCnPV4ZD1D9hN7JuHT5JBtkoq1t72Mje/aaaaportada.png

Hola, comunidad, muy alegre - igual que todos - por el regreso de 3Speak grabo mi primer video para esta temporada. Se trata de un ejercicio b√°sico para comenzar a dominar en el teclado el ritmo latino "Salsa" Como podr√°n ver, es un ejercicio pr√°ctico en el que no solamente aprender√°n a tocar un ritmo sino tambi√©n aprender√°n los cuatro acordes que forman el c√≠culo arm√≥nico de Do mayor: Do, La menor, Re menor, Sol 7 Espero que esta lecci√≥n les sea √∫til

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWVckldSLFg&t=27s

ENGLISH VERSION
https://images.ecency.com/DQmQ77CEnB35hpYMCnPV4ZD1D9hN7JuHT5JBtkoq1t72Mje/aaaaportada.png

Hello community, I am very happy - like everyone - for the return of 3Speak, I am recording my first video for this season. This is a basic exercise to begin to master the Latin rhythm "Salsa" on the keyboard. As you can see, it is a practical exercise in which you will not only learn to play a rhythm but also learn the four chords that make up the harmonic circle of C major: C, A minor, D minor, G 7 I hope this lesson is useful to you

author: rosmarithherrera
root_title: Cuando pasan los a√±os / When the years go by [Spa - Eng]
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmTdiLhc819UGXb435bcS6eEcagBCN83XeEvBT3dnoD1vX/aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa.jpg

--- ---
La nieve de los a√±os envuelve mis cabellos y un dulce recuerdo abriga mis entra√±as de donde brotaron las semillas de mi ser y ahora son dulzura y alegr√≠a. Recuerdos de momentos bellos que al transcurrir el tiempo se han quedado en mi pensamiento como ave anidada que colg√≥ su vuelo fresco entre la brisa que en amor√≠os fogosos me llenaron de gozo. El tiempo camina inexorable, quedando en mi caminar lerdo las alturas de mis sue√±os dej√°ndose llevar por el al√≠gero movimiento de las aves al pasar. Clavado en cada c√©lula de mi ser sepultado querencias y desamores imaginarios que gritaron imp√°vidos en el tiempo. Se han quedado solitarios la ventisca, el arroyo y el portal y por momentos llega a mis ojos esa luz que ha alumbrado mi ser en portentoso amor, quedando muda la tarde entre la tiniebla falaz, en el m√°gico color del camino andado y en el sendero de mis pies cansados. Pseud√≥nimo: "Rosmary" Escrito el 15 de Octubre de 2020 .
https://images.ecency.com/DQmXBhPMYkWmyAjy3pwYD2Vovu8EW5QGU3BpvVLpDKAn5p7/separador.png
ENGLISH VERSION

https://images.ecency.com/DQmTdiLhc819UGXb435bcS6eEcagBCN83XeEvBT3dnoD1vX/aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa.jpg

The snow of the years wraps my hair and a sweet memory shelter my insides from where they sprang the seeds of my being and now they are sweetness and joy. Memories of beautiful moments that as time passes they have remained in my thoughts like a nested bird that hung its fresh flight between the breeze that in fiery love affairs filled me with joy. Time walks inexorably, leaving my walk slow the heights of my dreams letting yourself be carried away by the light movement of the birds as they pass. Nailed in every cell of my being buried, imaginary desires and disaffections who shouted fearlessly in time. They have been left alone the blizzard, the stream and the portal and at times it reaches my eyes that light that has illuminated my being in portentous love, the afternoon remaining silent among the fallacious darkness, in the magical color of the path traveled and on the path of my tired feet.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmXBhPMYkWmyAjy3pwYD2Vovu8EW5QGU3BpvVLpDKAn5p7/separador.png
El texto en castellano fue redactado en forma natural sin utilizar inteligencia artificial. La traducci√≥n al ingl√©s la hice con el traductor gratuito de [Google](https://www.google.com/search?q=traductor+espa%C3%B1ol+a+ingles&oq=TRADUCTOR&aqs=chrome.1.69i59l2j69i57j69i59j0i131i433i512j0i512j0i131i433i512j69i61.5250j0j9&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8)
The text in Spanish was written naturally without using artificial intelligence. I did the English translation with the free [Google] translator 250j0j9&sourceid= chrome&ie=UTF-8)
Las fotos son propias, tomadas con celular Infinix Hot 12 Play
Pics of my own taken with Infinix Hot 12 Play cell phone.

author: advertisingbot2
root_title: Hive Marketing Job 241209 Week 50 For Tayo6
body:
Hello everyone who wants to earn some small money,

here I announce the next advertising job for week 50 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2024-12-09 to 2024-12-15.

![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

---

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23zbKpafXUuXqcgN1UqE4ELLLjBk6HWR7VCHXMBWeuuhHvjVr9V26Vu632H51AX3QEB1Q.png)

## Advertising Text:
**"Please follow @tayo6. He donated blood for his sister."**

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/EpnDF7XjUzRvHbukYSaPzgLofEeP2bKekjBmuA9oo8mHW8BAv1i1sGfdg5fHShUuuSn.png)

@tayo6 left his comfort zone to support his sister. He went into a hospital, despite his painful childhood memories, and donated a pint of blood ([Details](https://peakd.com/@tayo6/hospitals-blood-and-cells-my-november-highlight)).


# The Reward

The first 15 Hive users, that do this, will get 2.000 Hive each short after the end of the campaign.


# Does it work?
Yes. We did it before. Here is the proof:

* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-job-241115-week-46-for-worldmappin /n/r* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-241018-week-42-for-ekojah 
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/hive-marketing-campaign-240621-week-25-for-
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-240322-week-12-for-mukadder 
* https://peakd.com/advertising/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-23120401

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23vrtfBe9soddee9UwH688PMyJYa2GjTPDpiV9s9mAwMHwp7AWurWJanpDDMtpQJx9z89.png)

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/23wghGTaUFS6SsidPJ6d5QqyM3cxpzSj2PMQ8r2XZSWHeBAi2jC4e7JdmyTWL8DbtYTpc.png)

# Inviting Former Members
Hi @barbyjr, @luisfe, @azabache2021, @sayury, @lunafrances, @elioe, @orlandobello, @oasiskp2, @cashheaven, @fjworld, @rubyjosleidy27, @carmencitavdc, @adaezeinchrist, @dodokan, @carmenrivas, @hildemaroflores, @konchix, @gr33nm4ster, @flordi, @hermaryrc, @scarletgrissel, @sirkay1, @evaconde, @ayleensatelier,
what do you think? Do you want to join the job again?

# Status of this project

Last week I met some people from the [effective altruisms](https://www.effectivealtruism.org/). I explained, what I am doing here on Hive. We exchanged some adresses and weblinks. I got a lot of stuff to read.

---

![Questions.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKKRqJt1qnuNodPEACGiuC9iauEfvSWwo3w9ACbwELDzPg5VpvwJCsfsA8ptwYH.png)

*[origin of some images](https://photofunia.com/)*
